participant_abstract.sent: There are two versions: with and without LCD.
Other important features are: - Detachable (add-on) speech recognizer.
Security feature (robust to mishandlings; for kids).
Pre-filtering of TV programs by genre.
The prototypes were evaluated according to 3 criteria, namely fancy look- and-feel technological innovative and ease-to-use.
We scored high on all 3 criteria.

participant_decisions.sent: We decided not to produce the LCD version because the display can be transferred to the TV screen; this gives more space and fanciful display than the LCD.
We also decided that different kinds of "skin" can be used on the new prototype.
In particular, fruits and vegetable skins are fashionable, according to the marketing manager.
